title: New Game mode
body:
@RIOT Hey Riot,
I've been playing League of Legends for some years now, but over the last couple of weeks I have found myself getting tired of the same old games... I'll play some normal, then I'll jump on some ARAM. I try to mix it up a little.

I have some map designs and game ideas. I don't mean like 2 or 3 ideas, I'm talking 5 -10 decent ideas. 
Is there an email, or a skype account I can get a hold of?

replies.body:
You contact riot games directly with this, and you if you do put it on the boards starting with @RIOT.

It doesn't always work but it might much more then your effort here
